text:
A general (Bird's Eye) view, south from Broadway, at Pike Street, showing on the left the East River and on the right the Hudson River. All the piers south from the Manhattan Bridge are seen and the Brooklyn Bridge midway between the Battery (southern extremity of Manhattan). The Manhattan Bridge is in the foreground. (The Manhattan Bridge extends from between Market and Pike Streets, to the Williamsburg Section of the Borough of Kings). The Brooklyn Bridge extends from near North William and Frankfort Streets, to the Borough of Kings {Brooklyn}).

1927.

International News.
title: General view - East Broadway - South.
